abstract: Luigi de Vecchi has been appointed chairman of corporate and investment banking for continental Europe at Citigroup, the bank announced on Monday.
snippet: Luigi de Vecchi has been appointed chairman of corporate and investment banking for continental Europe at Citigroup, the bank announced on Monday.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – Luigi de Vecchi has been appointed chairman of corporate and investment banking for continental Europe at Citigroup, the bank announced on Monday.

headline.main: Citigroup Names Senior Banker in Europe
